comment.author: 47201412@N02
comment._content: Looking south from present day Suez Canal.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: This would seem to be the earlier photo of the two with the un-demolished wall behind the lady.  Probably hours (or next day?) between them due to the different shadows.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: I wonder if they all ate "Germea for Breakfast" or were sick of the sight of those adverts - presumably there to catch the eye of city-bound ferry passengers on the way to work in the mornings.  The other side of the building had adverts for the evening newspaper.

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: This photo was recently determined to be part of the Rocks Resumption photographic survey, the title and date of the image has been changed accordingly Here is a map of the Rocks Resumption area (last one in the sequence) AB
